habitat.climate: Temperate, with frequent rainfall and high humidity
habitat.terrain: Dense forest with towering, bioluminescent trees

appearance.color: Deep violet with glowing, emerald green patterns
appearance.size: Average height of 4 feet, wingspan of 7 feet

abilities.primary: Photokinesis - ability to manipulate and generate light
abilities.secondary: Limited flight - capable of short bursts of gliding and hovering
abilities.limitations: Vulnerable to extreme cold and dryness, powers weaken in the absence of light

behavior.patterns: Nocturnal, spending days resting within the glowing flora and becoming active at twilight
behavior.social_structure: Small family groups, communicating through intricate light patterns

lore.origin_story: Born from the first starlight that touched the Whispering Woods, Lumiflora are said to be guardians of the forest's magical light.

legends.title: The Lumiflora's Lullaby
legends.summary: A tale of how the Lumiflora's gentle light songs can soothe even the most troubled spirits and mend broken hearts.
